eventDecorators.name: BuyPool
eventDecorators.description: Event for token purchase logging. Event emitted in purchases. `buyer` is the account that sent the ETH, `beneficiary` is the account that got the tokens, `weiAmount` the amount of wei received from `buyer` and sent to the wallet, `tokenAmount` is the amount of tokens sent to `beneficiary`.

eventDecorators.name: OwnershipTransferred
eventDecorators.description: Event for token purchase logging. Event emitted in purchases. `buyer` is the account that sent the ETH, `beneficiary` is the account that got the tokens, `weiAmount` the amount of wei received from `buyer` and sent to the wallet, `tokenAmount` is the amount of tokens sent to `beneficiary`.

eventDecorators.name: SellPool
eventDecorators.description: Event for token purchase logging. Event emitted in purchases. `buyer` is the account that sent the ETH, `beneficiary` is the account that got the tokens, `weiAmount` the amount of wei received from `buyer` and sent to the wallet, `tokenAmount` is the amount of tokens sent to `beneficiary`.

parameterDecorators.name: _additionalArgs
parameterDecorators.description: bytes32 array for case if need pass some extra params, can be empty.

parameterDecorators.name: _additionalData
parameterDecorators.description: for provide any additional data, if not used just set "0x".

functionDecorators.name: getBacorConverterAddressByRelay
functionDecorators.description: helper for get bancor converter by bancor relay addrses.

functionDecorators.name: getBancorConnectorsAmountByRelayAmount
functionDecorators.description: helper for get value in pool for a certain connector address.

functionDecorators.name: getBancorConnectorsByRelay
functionDecorators.description: helper for get Bancor ERC20 connectors addresses.

functionDecorators.name: getBancorRatio
functionDecorators.description: helper for get ratio between assets in bancor newtork.

functionDecorators.name: getDataForBuyingPool
functionDecorators.description: this function provide necessary data for buy a pool token by a certain amount.

parameterDecorators.name: _amount
parameterDecorators.description: amount of pool token (or ETH for Uniswap).

functionDecorators.name: getTokenByUniswapExchange
functionDecorators.description: return ERC20 address from Uniswap exchange address.

functionDecorators.name: getUniswapConnectorsAmountByPoolAmount
functionDecorators.description: helper for get amounts for both Uniswap connectors for input amount of pool.

functionDecorators.name: getUniswapTokenAmountByETH
functionDecorators.description: return token amount by ETH input ratio.

functionDecorators.name: owner
functionDecorators.description: Returns the address of the current owner.

functionDecorators.name: renounceOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. * NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

parameterDecorators.name: _additionalArgs
parameterDecorators.description: bytes32 array for case if need pass some extra params, can be empty.

parameterDecorators.name: _additionalData
parameterDecorators.description: for provide any additional data, if not used just set "0x".

functionDecorators.name: sellPoolViaBancorV2
functionDecorators.description: helper for sell pool in Bancor network.

functionDecorators.name: transferOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.
